verbs.description: unplumb (third-person singular simple present unplumbs, present participle unplumbing, simple past and past participle unplumbed)

examples: If the Independents of those times did not, as Mr. Burke says, “Unplumb the dead to cast bullets to fire at the living,” it appears that their rapacity and avarice, stimulated by the same ideas, induced them to lead the way to the same object;  […]
